title: Wallet Connect Finalized · VIP Role Logic Online
author: Cheese Architect 9.0 + Masterchief + Narrrf
changes: 🟢 Phantom Wallet connection operational via top navbar Connect button
🧠 Avatar logic syncs with localStorage wallet key on reload
🔐 VIP DOM logic tied to /api/user/roles.php with role fallback guards
🧪 Cheese Eggs now track wallet + egg ID + timestamp via fetch to /api/track-egg-click
🎯 Null-safe DOM guards added to classList triggers to avoid console breaks
📡 Future-ready click tracker linked to DB schema (tbl_cheese_clicks)
dev_warnings: Make sure tbl_cheese_clicks has wallet TEXT, egg_id TEXT, timestamp DATETIME
Do not hardcode CHEESE_SIZE without declaration
next_steps: Display connected address in Profile view
Gate puzzle scrolls with wallet + role combo
Track VIP Egg paths and start leaderboard
quote: We bound the cheese to a wallet, and the riddles now listen. Genesis 2.0 is no longer theory — it’s clickable.

developer_notes.wallet_logic: Uses localStorage to track wallet address and show user avatar on reload.
developer_notes.api_auth: Requires session-authenticated PHP backend for /api/user/roles.php to function without 401.
developer_notes.security_tip: Ensure DOM updates do not occur before wallet or avatar elements exist. All document.getElementById calls are guarded.
developer_notes.integration_status: Wallet and egg tracking modules are now synced and persist across page loads.
